title: the Wind Walker
intro: The Crowned Queen of the Aelven race, and the Eleventh Paragon of Viridisia, Kiannah Ilicyne is known to be one of the Four Great Beauties of Valhalla. However, one cannot be deceived by her elegant appearance, as her arrow possesses the strength to reach any target from any corner of the world. Her mastery over the wind element allows her to set up a powerful wind barrier around the entire bastion, protecting the Aelves from all outside threats. Though, rather than staying at the throne, Kiannah has always wanted to glide through the wind and travel around the world.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.details:
Kiannah's abilities create wind, called the Wind Walk effect, either around her or in a target area, granting herself and all allies increased movement speed.

Kiannah's movement speed boost is slightly more than the one her allies receive. When the Wind Walk effect is worn off, the movement speed boost will not disappear straight away but rapidly decay within a second instead.

abilities.name: Tailwind Arrow
abilities.details:
Kiannah fires a piercing arrow in a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies in the path until it reaches the first enemy hero.

The enemy hero who gets hit will leave behind a wind trail that has Wind Walk effect. The wind trail will stay for a while and when the time is up, it will start fading from the beginning point first. This wind trail can be cleansed.

abilities.name: Gale Force
abilities.details:
Kiannah enchants her bow for a duration to gain increased attack speed and allow her basic attack to strike the enemy target for two additional times, each dealing a percentage of her physical power.

Every time when Kiannah hits three basic attacks, she briefly creates a Wind Walk effect on herself.

abilities.name: Aero Barrage
abilities.details:
Kiannah fires a hail of arrows at the target location, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies within the area and leaving a wind zone that slows all the enemies on top.

The wind zone stays around for a short duration and grants the Wind Walk effect. After the arrows have landed, that's when the wind zone spreads out. In other words, the area that applies the slow and Wind Walk effect is slightly larger than the hitbox.

abilities.name: Tempest Veil
abilities.details:
Kianna summons powerful whirlwind to surround herself, creating a vast wind zone that grants Wind Walk effect. Upon casting this ability, Kiannah removes all slowing effect on herself and allies. In addition, the increased movement speed boost from Wind Walk effect is doubled.

The wind zone will follow Kiannah for a short while. Allies existing the wind zone will start the one second decaying effect, but re-entering will immediately remove that.
